title: Caspar David Peter
text:
Hi, I am an associate Professor at Rotterdam School of Management (RSM) Erasmus University Rotterdam in the Netherlands. This is my personal website that I use to gather things that I do in my job, such as my teaching, useful resources, and publications, but also to not loose track of the shenanigans that I do on the side.
This website is still under construction!
